site.defaultDescription: Poorna Shiksha is a home-based learning initiative in Delhi supporting underprivileged children through academics, creativity, and life-changing educational experiences.

routes.title: Empowering Children in Delhi
routes.description: Poorna Shiksha empowers underprivileged children in Delhi through academics, creativity, mentorship, and educational outings that build confidence.

routes.title: Our Story
routes.description: Learn how Seema Singla started Poorna Shiksha and built a nurturing, home-based learning space for children from underserved communities in Delhi.

routes.title: Learning Activities
routes.description: Explore Poorna Shiksha activities including reading, art, storytelling, and educational outings that make learning joyful and practical for children.

routes.title: Our Impact
routes.description: Read impact stories, outcomes, and progress from children supported by Poorna Shiksha through consistent teaching, care, and life-enriching experiences.

routes.title: Support Our Mission
routes.description: Support Poorna Shiksha with donations or volunteering to help provide books, supplies, snacks, and educational experiences for children in Delhi.

routes.title: Contact Us
routes.description: Contact Poorna Shiksha to donate, volunteer, visit, or learn more about our work with underprivileged children and community learning in Delhi.
